name: plugin-infrastructure
description: Reusable infrastructure relating to testing, building, and deploying my WordPress plugins.
author: Mayank Majeji

scripts.bump:patch: bump patch --commit 'Version %s.' class-mantis-up-utility.php package.json package-lock.json readme.txt wp-content/db.php
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor --commit 'Version %s.' class-mantis-up-utility.php package.json package-lock.json readme.txt wp-content/db.php
scripts.bump:major: bump major --commit 'Version %s.' class-mantis-up-utility.php package.json package-lock.json readme.txt wp-content/db.php
scripts.icons: sharp -i .wordpress-org/icon.svg -o .wordpress-org/icon-128x128.png -f png --palette resize 128 128 && sharp -i .wordpress-org/icon.svg -o .wordpress-org/icon-256x256.png -f png --palette resize 256 256 && sharp -i .wordpress-org/icon-light.svg -o docs/assets/logo.png -f png --palette resize 256 256
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:html && composer run lint
scripts.test:all: npm run lint:all && composer run test && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
